help.content: The Search widget will allow you search the map in the following ways:
help.title: Search Tips

showUsAnExampleFeatureSource.help: Search for an event ellipse by type.
showUsAnExampleFeatureSource.name: Event Ellipses

sources.help: Search for a place on earth by name.
sources.name: Esri World Geocoder

sources.help: The format for Decimal Degrees should look like this: 15.243 16.611
sources.name: Decimal Degrees

sources.help: The format for the degree minute seconds should look like this: 29°58'43.0"N 31°08'04.0"E
sources.name: Degree Minute Seconds

sources.help: The MRGS locations should contain the grid zone designator followed by the 100k meter square id, the easting, and then the northing.  Spaces can either be included or omitted between these parts.  An example is as follows 56HLH3487852289
sources.name: MGRS

sources.help: The UTM coordinate takes the zone number followed by easting and nothing.  Spaces are required between these parts. For example: 56S 334863 -3747709
sources.name: UTM
